channel.title: Lifeline Bay - Azure Onyxscore (Dance, Busy Bassline, Piano)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/azureonyx/lifeline-bay
For any veteran Auxy user, the drum kits may sound familiar. That's because this track was made back in Auxy 4, before the drum sample overhaul.
This was originally a tournament submission in one of DHO's tournaments that is unfortunately not gonna happen again due to the drastic decrease in Auxy Disco traffic, at least, that's how I'm seeing it.
